verses.name: Numbers 35:11
verses.text: Then ye shall appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you; that the slayer may flee thither, which killeth any person at unawares.

verses.name: Numbers 35:12
verses.text: And they shall be unto you cities for refuge from the avenger; that the manslayer die not, until he stand before the congregation in judgment.

verses.name: Numbers 35:13
verses.text: And of these cities which ye shall give six cities shall ye have for refuge.

verses.name: Numbers 35:14
verses.text: Ye shall give three cities on this side Jordan, and three cities shall ye give in the land of Canaan, which shall be cities of refuge.
